content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (10.5, 34.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position (10.5, 34.5)
- Small Electric Poles at positions (10.5, 31.5) and (12.5, 34.5)
- Pipes at positions (8.5, 34.5), (8.5, 37.5), and (9.5, 37.5)

### Offshore Pump System
1. Offshore Pump at position (-7.5, 25.5)
   - Connected to pipes at positions (-7.5, 24.5), (-6.5, 24.5), and (-6.5, 25.5)
2. Offshore Pump at position (0.5, 30.5)
   - Connected to pipes at positions (1.5, 29.5), (1.5, 30.5), and (1.5, 31.5)

### Boiler System
- Boiler at position (-1.5, 27.0)
  - Connected to pipes at positions (-3.5, 26.5) and (-3.5, 27.5)

### Copper Plate Production
- Stone Furnace at position (15.0, 0.0)
  - Inserters at positions (16.5, 0.5) and (17.5, 0.5) connected to power

### Storage and Transfer
- Wooden Chests at positions (5.5, 0.5) and (18.5, 0.5)

### Pipe Networks
- Multiple PipeGroups across various positions, facilitating fluid transport

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Placing Pipes
- Ensure there is no existing object in the target location before placing a pipe. Clear obstructions if necessary.

### Errors Related to Power Connection
- Verify that all electrical components are properly connected to the power network to avoid "not connected to power network" warnings.

### Errors with Inserter Power
- Ensure inserters are connected to a power source to avoid "not receiving electricity" warnings.

### Errors with Fluid Connections
- Make sure all fluid connections are properly established to prevent "no input liquid" and "no fluid present in connections" warnings.
